job_tasks.phrase: Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications tailored for market research clients
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of AI models, specifically focusing on LLM applications, which falls under model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Support the development of interactive dashboards
job_tasks.justification: Developing dashboards, even if AI-powered, is a software development task that integrates AI outputs into a user interface.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with AI specialists, cloud experts and stakeholders to deliver robust, scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI solutions into a larger system and emphasizes the software engineering principles of robustness and scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously learn more about business applications and propose innovative AI solutions to address business challenges.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the need to understand business needs and translate them into AI solutions, which is a core aspect of business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the need to keep learning about new AI and LLM developments, fitting the definition of Learning & Adaptability.

job_tasks.phrase: Help us develop internal trainings on AI/ML.
job_tasks.justification: Developing training materials is a form of knowledge dissemination and contribution to the team's technical capabilities, aligning with software development and integration efforts in a broader sense of team enablement.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly speaks to the proactive and ownership-driven nature of the role, fitting the Innovation & Ownership category.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest AI and LLM developments.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions the need to keep learning about new AI and LLM developments, fitting the definition of Learning & Adaptability.

profile.rationale: The job ad clearly outlines a blend of core AI/LLM development tasks (Develop deep learning powered AI, especially LLM applications) and software engineering responsibilities (Support the development of interactive dashboards, deliver robust, scalable solutions). The explicit mention of LLM providers and cloud services like AWS further solidifies the GenAI focus. The emphasis on proposing solutions to business challenges and staying updated with AI developments also points to a balanced role between specialization and application.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the responsibilities, technologies, and the type of AI focus (LLM applications). The tasks align well with the definitions provided in the coding book, making the analysis straightforward and the profile assignment unambiguous.
